remarks: The converse of the lattice translation of an atom is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2013.)
statement:
ltrnel.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnel.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnel.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnel.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrncnvat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ P e. A ) -> ( `' F ` P ) e. A ) $.
